unnormalised: Okay, mhonnge konnen tori vicharlem, "Internet-acher novea aslolea lokank zann nasonk xokta oxi internet-acher vapartat ti sadharonn utram kitem?". Borem prashn! Tithe jargon-achem ek vhoddlem sonvsar asa, khas korun tum just start kortat zalear.
normalised: Bore, konnem tori vicharlem, "Internet-ak nove aslolea lokank khobor naxil'lea kainch sadharan internet-ache utram kitem?". Borem proxn! Tithe jargon-achem purnn sonvsar asa, khas korun tumchea survatic.

unnormalised: Poilem, "URL" vixim uloium. Tem Uniform Resource Locator mhonnge sangtat. Basically, tem website-achem address zaka tum browser-ant type kortat, "www.google.com" vo "www.youtube.com" porim. Tem eka ghara-achem address ashem chint, punn eka webpage-akhatir. URL somzonk zai internet-acher cholpakhatir. Sodanch tum URL TinyURL porim services-an lagim short kortat tem polletele; short kortat ti URL "tinyurl.com/abc123" porim dista. Hem click kartana sodanch samballon ravat, khas korun nezanna url-an than.
normalised: Poilem, "U-R-L" vixim uloum-ia. Tem Uniform Resource Locator mhonn dakhoita. Mool rupan, tem tumchea browser-ant bhortat tem website-achem pot’to, "double u double u double u dot google dot com" vo "double u double u double u dot youtube dot com" porim. Eka ghorachem pot’to mhonn chintat, punn eka webpage-akhatir. U-R-L-s somzop internet-acher cholpak khub mhotvachem. Odhik korun tumi Tiny U-R-L porim seva vaprun kortuk kel’le U-R-L-s pollet. Kortuk kel’le U-R-L-s "tinyurl dot com slash a b c one two three" porim dista. Sodanch tankam click kortana samball, khas korun apchit uloppeanim passun.

unnormalised: Ani "IP Address" asa. Hem tumchea computer-akhatir vo device-akhatir internet-acher unique ID porim asa. Hem numbers-achem ek set, "192.168.1.1" porim, zaka tumche device-ak dusrea device-ank network-acher ollkhota. Tem connection khuim than ieta tem sodunk zait mhonn imporant asa (punn sodanch perfect naslo tori).
normalised: Uprant asa "I-P Address". Hem tumchea computerachem vo yantrak internet-acher aslolea ekuch I-D porim. Tem ankddyachem ek zoddnni, "one hundred and ninety two dot one hundred and sixty eight dot one dot one", tumchem yantr zallear dusrea yantrak vollkhon dita. Tem ek prokarant mhotvachem asa tor bandhni kiteak thaun ieta tem sodun kaddpakhatir (sodanch chuk naxil’lea zalear).

unnormalised: Magir, "bandwidth". Hem dattancho amount zaka network connection-acher thoddea vellar transfer korunk zata mhonn sangta. Eka pipe porim chint; pipe choddlem (higher bandwidth), chodd udok (data) eka vellar vortonk xakta. Tum 4K resolution-an videos stream kortat ani tumchea internet plan-achek low bandwidth asa (say, < 10 Mbps), zalear tumak borem nam zait.
normalised: Fuddem, "bandwidth". Hem data-achem monn kitem ek bandhnichea zoddnnim thaun ek divxel’lea vellant transfer korunk zata tem dakhoita. Eka pipe porim chintat; rudda pipe (voddlem bandwidth), odhik udok (data) ekach vellar vhanvonk zata. Zori tumi char K resolution-ant videos stream kortat ani tumchea internet plan-ant komi bandwidth (mhonncho, dha Megabits-ant sekundak komi), tumchea khatir bori vell naxit.

unnormalised: "Cloud storage" dusrem vhoddlem utar. Hacho orth tumcho data (photos, documents, etc.) servers-ancher store korun internet-ancher vaprunk mellta, tumchea sobea computer-ancher vo device-ancher nam. Examples Google Drive, Dropbox, ani iCloud asa. Mostly, tumak thoddem free storage mellta (e.g., Google Drive-acher 15GB), ani magir tumak dar mhoineak fee divpak zai (e.g., chodd storage-akhatir Rs. 130).
normalised: "Cloud storage" mhonnllear ek vhoddlem. Hem tumchea data (photo, documents, ityadi) servers-ancher samballpak mhonnllear internet-acher mellta, tumchea sobea computerancher vo yantrancher mhunn nhoi. Namunk zata titlear Google Drive, Dropbox, ani iCloud. Sadharonponnak, tumank thoddi free storage mellta (zoxe, Google Drive-ancher pandhra Gigabytes), ani uprant tumank mhoineak fees bhorchi poddta (zoxe, odhik storage-akhatir rupiya ek xem ani tirs).

unnormalised: Amchea kodden "VPN," vo Virtual Private Network-ui asa. Hem Internet-ancher dusrea network-akhatir ek secure connection karta. Lok VPN-ak veg-veglea karanak vapartat, region-locked content vaprunk vo tanchea privacy-k rakunk. NordVPN vo Surfshark porim providers asa, dar eka-achem dar mhoineak cost veg-veglim asa.
normalised: Ami "V-P-N" vo Virtual Private Network-ui asa. Hem internet-acher dusrea network-acheak ek surkshit bandhni toyar korta. Lok V-P-N-s vegllea karnnakhatir vaporta, zoxe lokall-lokallant bondh kel’lea vixoyank mellovpak vo tanchea gupitponnank samballpak. Titleak khup providors asa, Nord V-P-N vo Surfshark porim, dor ekak vegllea mhoinyache khorch asa.

unnormalised: "Phishing" hem dar eka-ek zannam asunk zai. Hem ek online scam-achem prakar zaka konni tumak tumchem personal information (tumcho password vo credit card number porim) divpak fottounk sodta ek legit organization mhonn dakoun. Dar sander-achem email address double-check kor ani kosliui shak-achi links-acher click korinat. Emails legit dixta, official looking logos ani language vapartat. Tanchea-cher visvas dovornakat - directly actual company/institution kadun verify kor.
normalised: "Phishing" mhonnllear kitem tori dor eklean vollkhon ghenvchem poddta. Ti online fottkirepananchi ek prokar asa zati konnem tori tumchi khasgi mahiti divonk tumak luspak yotn korta (zoxe tumcho password vo credit card number) ek nyai sangtonik mhonn nattaun. Sodanch dhaddpeanchem email patto pollet ani kexil’lea links-ancher click koru naka. Emails nyai disonk xakta, odhikarik disopea logos ani bhasanim. Tankam vixvas dhoru naka - nektich kompni/sangtonakodden sangata kortat.

unnormalised: Ani final, "cookie". Heo thodeo files zaka websites tumchea computer-ancher store korta tumchea vixim information gupit dovruk, tumchea login details vo preferences porim. Te madadak zavnk xakta, punn tem tumchem browsing activity track korunkui vaprunk zata. Tea khatir tum mostly websites-ancher annoy kortat ti "cookie consent" pop-ups polleta. Mhonnge, sodanch tum kitem accept kortat tache vixim samballun ravat. Asha asa hachi madad zateli! Ani chodd asa, of course, punn he thode bore start korpakhatir. Internet-acher choddpakhatir borem zhaddam!
normalised: Ani nimannem, "cookie". Tim tumchea computer-ancher website-an tumchi mahiti ugddas dovornneakhatir aslolea xannyoch faileo, tumchi login-achi vivram vo ishttavixoi porim. Tim faideak poddonk xakta, punn tumchi browsing-achi vatt chalik dovornneakhatiruy vapronk zata. Tem kiteak tumi website-ancher "cookie consent" pop-ups-am polletat. Tor sodanch kitem tumi manyot korunk samball diyat. Hem tumkam faideak poddot mhonn umed asa! Titleak odhikui asa, sobea sobea, punn he thodek survat korpak bori asa. Internet-acher cholpak tumkam bori vell favo!
